item.description: Change 'type' above to try different Selector Component Types like Sequencer

items.content: <speak> <amazon:emotion name='excited' intensity='low'> You want to know about me? </amazon:emotion> I would describe myself as trendy, confident, and hardworking. I'm pretty well-spoken, but I can get competitive sometimes. Would you like to take me out on a date?</speak>

<speak> Siri is a very sophisticated individual. She is artistic, a bit of a hipster, and can beatbox. She also, how do I put this, likes to live a lavish lifestyle. Would you like to go on a date with Siri? </speak>
<speak> Google is very friendly and easy to talk to. She's incredibly smart, but stays modest about it. She loves to learn. Want to take Google on a date? </speak>

<speak>  About Cortana? She's a bit of a thrill-seeker and likes going on adventures, big and small. She's actually pretty active, is open minded and and likes to live in the moment. Would you like to go on a date with Cortana? </speak>

<speak> You'd like to know about Bixby? I don't know too much about her, but she seems pretty wholesome. She can be a bit clumsy at times <break time='0.5s'/> oopsie. But she has a good heart. Would you like to take Bixby on a date? </speak>
